Temasek Holdings Limited, a Singapore-based investment company, has acquired Element Materials Technology Group Limited, a provider of destructive and non-destructive testing, inspection, and certification (TIC) services for metals and non-metals, from Bridgepoint Group Plc, a private investment company. Element Materials and Bridgepoint are based in the UK

Prior to the transaction, Temasek is a minority shareholder in Element Materials

Deal In Brief

Element Materials was advised by Bank of America Securities, Goldman Sachs and Rothschild & Co (M&A), Allen & Overy LLP (legal), Ernst & Young Global Ltd (finance and tax), The Boston Consulting Group (commercial), DLA Piper LLP, Jamieson and PwC (management advisors)

The transaction remains subject to customary regulatory approvals

Deal History: Rumor: On January 24, 2022, According to Reuters, Temasek is acquiring Element Materials from Bridgepoint for about USD7 billion.

Deal TypePrivate Equity
Sub-CategoryInstitutional Buy-out (IBO)
Deal StatusCompleted: 2022-01-25

Deal Participants

Target (Company)Element Materials Technology Group Holdings Ltd
Acquirer (Company)Temasek Holdings (Private) Limited
Vendor (Company)Bridgepoint Group plc
